 2021-03882021-05-11,  NRCAN,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Energy Regulator Act
PrecisAppointment of KARIM MAHMUD of Foothills, Alberta, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Energy Regulator, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, on a part-time basis.
